metadata.dc:author: Pastor, I
Gamallo, C
Rodríguez, J I
Collado, F
Cuevas, J
metadata.dc:description: A new case of short rib-polydactyly with multiple visceral malformations is reported. Authors wish to draw attention to existence of intermediate forms between Majewski type and Saldino-Noonan type.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de costilla corta-polidactilia con malformaciones viscerales múltiples.
[Short rib-polydactyly with multiple visceral malformations (author's transl)].
